comments.body:
Does it work? We check the type of gapDuration and expect str type here.

https://github.com/apache/spark/blob/f7c85b855ba99757c750dd0a2f7aced788c89374/python/pyspark/sql/functions.py#L2336-L2368

https://github.com/apache/spark/blob/bbf988bd73b00d18dd1d443f225b3915a2c4433f/python/pyspark/sql/functions.pyi#L139
Oh, I don't realize python `session_window` doesn't accept an expression...

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +1190,1194 @@events = ...  # streaming DataFrame of schema { timestamp: Timestamp, userId: String }

session_window = session_window(events.timestamp, \
    F.when(events.userId == "user1", "5 seconds") \
    .when(events.userId == "user2", "20 seconds").otherwise("5 minutes"))
